entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023
